add-package.description: Add a new package to the workspace.

remove-package.description: Remove a package from the workspace.

add-angular.description: Add Angular compatibility to a package.

focus-packages.description: Focus workspace and demo's to particular packages.

sync-packages-with-demos.description: If a developer manually adds a package without using -npm run add- you can try to sync packages with demo apps.

add-demo.description: Add additional demo app flavors to the workspace. Restricted to 1 of each: demo (vanilla), demo-angular, demo-react, demo-svelte, demo-vue
